docsTags.name: virtualProp
docsTags.text: {"ios" | "md"} mode - The mode determines which platform styles to use.

props.name: animated
props.docs: If `true`, the action sheet will animate.

props.name: backdropDismiss
props.docs: If `true`, the action sheet will be dismissed when the backdrop is clicked.

props.name: buttons
props.docs: An array of buttons for the action sheet.

props.name: cssClass
props.docs:
Additional classes to apply for custom CSS. If multiple classes are
provided they should be separated by spaces.

props.name: enterAnimation
props.docs: Animation to use when the action sheet is presented.

props.name: htmlAttributes
props.docs: Additional attributes to pass to the action sheet.

props.name: keyboardClose
props.docs: If `true`, the keyboard will be automatically dismissed when the overlay is presented.

props.name: leaveAnimation
props.docs: Animation to use when the action sheet is dismissed.

props.name: mode
props.docs: The mode determines which platform styles to use.

props.name: translucent
props.docs:
If `true`, the action sheet will be translucent.
Only applies when the mode is `"ios"` and the device supports
[`backdrop-filter`](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/backdrop-filter#Browser_compatibility).

methods.name: dismiss
methods.signature: dismiss(data?: any, role?: string | undefined) => Promise<boolean>
methods.docs: Dismiss the action sheet overlay after it has been presented.

docsTags.name: param
docsTags.text: data Any data to emit in the dismiss events.

docsTags.name: param
docsTags.text:
role The role of the element that is dismissing the action sheet.
This can be useful in a button handler for determining which button was
clicked to dismiss the action sheet.
Some examples include: ``"cancel"`, `"destructive"`, "selected"`, and `"backdrop"`.

methods.name: onDidDismiss
methods.docs: Returns a promise that resolves when the action sheet did dismiss.

methods.name: onWillDismiss
methods.docs: Returns a promise that resolves when the action sheet will dismiss.

methods.name: present
methods.docs: Present the action sheet overlay after it has been created.

events.docs: Emitted after the alert has dismissed.
Emitted after the alert has presented.
Emitted before the alert has dismissed.
Emitted before the alert has presented.

styles.name: --backdrop-opacity
styles.docs: Opacity of the backdrop

styles.name: --background
styles.docs: Background of the action sheet group

styles.name: --button-background
styles.docs: Background of the action sheet button

styles.name: --button-background-activated
styles.docs: Background of the action sheet button when pressed. Note: setting this will interfere with the Material Design ripple.

styles.name: --button-background-activated-opacity
styles.docs: Opacity of the action sheet button background when pressed

styles.name: --button-background-focused
styles.docs: Background of the action sheet button when tabbed to

styles.name: --button-background-focused-opacity
styles.docs: Opacity of the action sheet button background when tabbed to

styles.name: --button-background-hover
styles.docs: Background of the action sheet button on hover

styles.name: --button-background-hover-opacity
styles.docs: Opacity of the action sheet button background on hover

styles.name: --button-background-selected
styles.docs: Background of the selected action sheet button

styles.name: --button-background-selected-opacity
styles.docs: Opacity of the selected action sheet button background

styles.name: --button-color
styles.docs: Color of the action sheet button

styles.name: --button-color-activated
styles.docs: Color of the action sheet button when pressed

styles.name: --button-color-focused
styles.docs: Color of the action sheet button when tabbed to

styles.name: --button-color-hover
styles.docs: Color of the action sheet button on hover

styles.name: --button-color-selected
styles.docs: Color of the selected action sheet button

styles.name: --color
styles.docs: Color of the action sheet text

styles.name: --height
styles.docs: height of the action sheet

styles.name: --max-height
styles.docs: Maximum height of the action sheet

styles.name: --max-width
styles.docs: Maximum width of the action sheet

styles.name: --min-height
styles.docs: Minimum height of the action sheet

styles.name: --min-width
styles.docs: Minimum width of the action sheet

styles.name: --width
styles.docs: Width of the action sheet
